root.name: Pat Riley Basketball
root.description: Pat Riley Basketball is comprised of two modes of play: Exhibition and Tournament.Like standard basketball, the game consists of four quarters. The player however, has the ability to change the length of each quarter. Times range from 5 to 20 minutes of play.The player may choose one of eight teams:LA HoopsDetroit JetsDallas WingsDenver JammersSeattle BearsBoston BashersHouston RebelsNew York Busters
